meanings.definition: The state of lying in the same straight line.
meanings.sent1: The collinearity of the stars in the sky made a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent2: The collinearity of the fence posts ensured a perfectly aligned boundary.
meanings.sent3: The collinearity of the pencils on the desk seemed to form a secret code.
meanings.sent4: The collinearity of the trees along the road created a sense of order in nature.
meanings.sent5: The collinearity of the buildings in the city skyline was striking against the sunset.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being collinear.
meanings.sent1: Her artwork displayed a remarkable collinearity of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent2: The collinearity of the design elements gave the room a modern feel.
meanings.sent3: The collinearity of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The collinearity of the dancers' movements on stage was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The collinearity of the notes in the music piece created a harmonious melody.
